name: Hanoi Homevisit Tour
description:
At the end of each city tour, tourists are always taken to a restaurant to have dinner. With HANOI HOMEVISIT, instead, tourists will be invited to visit to an ordinary Hanoi Family not only to have dinner with Hanoi people but also they can learn and observe the typical life of people, know about some of the traditions and listen Hanoi people talk about their life.

Project Purposes:
- Offer the new service in a normal Hanoi City Tour, give Tourists a chance to discover Hanoi Life in a new way.
- Bring the benefits to the retirees and other old people (physically – by an amount of income and mentally – by the family atmosphere when visitors come)
- Vietnamese culture and Vietnamese contemporary lives are reflected and expressed by Vietnamese young people’s presentation about their families, their tradition and even their point of view of every matter in life.
